messages.author: Alex Chen (CEO)
messages.content: Great news team! Just closed our seed round - $2.5M led by Bessemer. This gives us 24 months runway to hit product-market fit. Let's ship! ðŸš€

messages.author: Sarah Kim (Head of Product)
messages.content: Customer feedback from this week: 1) WhatsApp integration is #1 request (shipping Feb 15!), 2) Merchants love the auto-categorization feature, 3) Some confusion about pricing tiers. Working with marketing on clearer pricing page.

messages.author: Marcus Johnson (CTO)
messages.content: Heads up: We're migrating from GPT-3.5 to GPT-4 this weekend. Expect 2x better responses but 3x higher costs. Finance approved the budget increase. Rollback plan ready if issues arise.

messages.author: Emily Rodriguez (Customer Success)
messages.content: Big win! Fashion retailer TrendyStyles (50k orders/month) just upgraded to our Pro plan. They saw 70% reduction in support tickets in their trial. This could be our case study for the website.

messages.author: David Park (Senior Engineer)
messages.content: Shipped the new caching layer - chat responses now 60% faster (avg 320ms). Also fixed the Unicode bug affecting Japanese merchants. Monitoring closely over the weekend.

messages.author: Lisa Wang (Head of Sales)
messages.content: Pipeline update: 15 demos scheduled this week. Seeing strong interest from beauty/cosmetics vertical. Main objection: 'How is this different from Gorgias?' Need better competitive positioning docs.
